poem:
### Vine of the Soul

In the jungle's dense embrace,  
a vine whispers secrets,  
time-weaved in Quechua threads.  
Lost tongues meet modern eyes,  
a dance of rich and perilous truths,  
where spirits walk and currencies talk.  
Roots deeper than commerce,  
souls trace forgotten paths,  
seeking in ancient shadows,  
the light within the dark.
